column4: A kitchen used for the production of food (full meals or parts of meals such as bakeries) for facilities other than that of the central kitchen.
A kitchen that is used for the instruction of the culinary arts. This type of kitchen does not produce food to be served.
A kitchen used for the production of food (full meals or parts of meals such as bakeries) for that facility and for other facilities.
A kitchen used for the production of food for that facility only.
